tribe_name: Confederated Tribes of the Warm Springs Reservation of Oregon

awards.recipient_name_raw: CONFEDERATED TRIBES OF WARM SPRINGS RESERVATION OF OREGON
awards.description: THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE CONFEDERATED TRIBES OF WARM SPRINGS TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS. SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL DEVELOP AND IMPLEMENT A SOLID WASTE PROGRAM ON TRIBAL LANDS, ASSESS COMPLIANCE WITH REGULATIONS, AND CONDUCT GROUNDWATER MONITORING AT THE LANDFILL.

awards.recipient_name_raw: CONFEDERATED TRIBES OF WARM SPRINGS RESERVATION OF OREGON
awards.description: DESCRIPTION:THE CONFEDERATED TRIBES OF WARM SPRINGS WILL USE GAP FUNDING TO ADDRESS PRIORITY ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERNS IN THE COMMUNITY. ENVIRONMENTAL STAFF WILL FOCUS ON BUILDING SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT CAPACITY, WITH THE GOAL OF ACHIEVING PROGRAMMATIC GROWTH TO MAINTAIN MEANINGFUL PARTICIPATION IN EPA PROGRAMS. KEY AREAS OF FOCUS INCLUDE ADDRESSING SOLID WASTE EQUIPMENT AND FACILITY IMPROVEMENT NEEDS.ACTIVITIES:ACTIVITIES PERFORMED UNDER THE GRANT WILL FOCUS ON PURCHASING EQUIPMENT AND IMPROVING TRANSFER STATION FACILITIES WITH INSTALLATION OF LIGHTS AND CAMERAS, ULTIMATELY ENHANCING MEANINGFUL PARTICIPATION IN EPA PROGRAMS. THESE SOLID WASTE IMPLEMENTATION ACTIVITIES WILL BE INSTRUMENTAL TO ACHIEVING ENVIRONMENTAL RESULTS.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES FROM THE CONFEDERATED TRIBES OF WARM SPRINGS WILL INCLUDE FACILITY IMPROVEMENTS AT RURAL TRANSFER STATIONS, AND QUARTERLY PROGRESS REPORTS TO EPA OUTLINING PROGRESS TOWARDS ENVIRONMENTAL RESULTS IN PRIORITY AREAS. EXPECTED OUTCOMES INCLUDE THE CAPACITY TO MANAGE CURRENT VOLUMES OF SOLID WASTE, AND TO KEEP SOLID WASTE CONTAINED WITHIN DISPOSAL AREAS. DIRECT BENEFICIARIES OF THIS GRANT ARE MEMBERS OF THE TRIBE.
